hero.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
hero.description1: Passionate, curious developer motivated by the desire to learn and improve constantly. With over 5 years of experience on various projects, I have developed strong listening skills and service orientation that enable me to work effectively in teams and meet client needs.
hero.description2: My technical capabilities are constantly evolving through continuous learning and regular technology monitoring. My goal is to provide innovative and high-performance solutions using best development practices and the most suitable technologies for each project.
hero.description3: I specialize in JavaScript and TypeScript development, with expertise in modern frameworks like Vue.js, Angular, and Node.js. My experience spans from building earth observation platforms for the "new space" domain to developing crowdfunding platforms for French municipalities.
hero.description4: Whether it's optimizing application performance, integrating complex APIs, or leading technical initiatives, I bring a combination of technical expertise and collaborative spirit to every project.
hero.callToAction: If this excites you, I'd love to hear from you.
hero.availableDescription: Currently accepting new projects and full-time opportunities. Let's build something amazing together.

experience.title: Professional Journey & Impact
experience.subtitle: Detailing my progression through diverse roles where I've driven innovation, delivered scalable solutions, and consistently contributed to team success.

callToAction.title: Ready for New Challenges
callToAction.description: Let's discuss how my experience can contribute to your next project.

angular_dev.title: Angular Developer
angular_dev.description: Maintenance and development of KaiR, an online appointment scheduling solution for the social housing sector.
achievements: Continuous improvement of user interface through numerous ergonomic optimizations and bug fixes
Application performance improvement through Firebase cloud functions optimization and critical bug fixes
Development of reusable Angular components and maintenance of existing code

vue_node_dev.title: Vue and Node.js Developer
vue_node_dev.description: Maintenance and development of earth observation platform and crowdfunding platform for French municipalities.
achievements: Developed interface for centralizing image and processing orders for earth observation platform
Created registration process for investors and borrowers on crowdfunding platform
Integrated Mangopay webhooks for real-time transaction notifications
Integrated France map with MapBox API highlighting project-carrying cities
Improved data management interface performance for better user experience

angular_node.title: Angular and Node.js Developer
angular_node.description: Design and development of Asset Manager application for managing 3D resources and virtual conference platform.
achievements: Created custom theme with Angular Material in harmony with design guidelines
Developed file sharing interface and API (listing, upload, download)
Built user management system with role assignment functionality
Developed real-time messaging system with Socket.io for Q&A sessions
Created content management system for presentation images and videos

web_dev.title: Web Developer
web_dev.description: Web development and maintenance focused on responsive design and dashboard development.
achievements: Redesigned hellopro.fr product page with responsive integration
Dynamized pages with PHP and jQuery for better user interaction
Maintained "Process BPO" web application used internally
Designed and developed comprehensive dashboard for BPO agent activity monitoring

crowdfunding.title: Municipal Crowdfunding Platform
crowdfunding.description: Crowdfunding platform for French municipalities with investor/borrower registration, Mangopay integration, and interactive France map with MapBox.

asset_manager.title: Asset Manager - 3D Resource Management
asset_manager.description: Web application for managing 3D resources with file sharing capabilities, user management, and role assignment functionality.

conference.title: Virtual Conference Platform
conference.description: Platform for international virtual conferences with content management, JWT authentication, and real-time Q&A messaging using Socket.io.

dashboard.description: Comprehensive dashboard providing insights into BPO agent activity and tool performance with responsive design.

descriptions.frontend: Building responsive, accessible, and performant user interfaces with a focus on modern frameworks and best practices.
descriptions.backend: Developing robust and scalable server-side applications, APIs, and database solutions.
descriptions.tools: Utilizing a wide range of development tools, platforms, and version control systems to streamline workflows.
